short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download avatars, images, live photos and videos from Xiaohongshu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ğŸ†• v0.1.4: Fixed note URL pattern to account for Xiaohongshu website's changes. Full release note is at https://codeconuts.github.io/xhs-downloader/en/release.html
ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» This extension is in beta version, please kindly report bugs (best including the note you want to download) and suggest features to codeconuts.ai@gmail.com. We will reply as soon as possible.

âœ¨ With just a few clicks, you can

1. Download user avatars (jpg), note images (jpg), live photos, and videos
2. Download note text (markdown) and note media and view the note conveniently on your PC
3. Download all notes on a user profile with just 2 clicks

âœ¨ Other features:

1. View download progress:
Visit the webpage of the downloading note, and open the popup to view progress.

2. Download files in background:
You can switch to another tab / visit another webpage / close the tab without interrupting the download.

3. Remember what you downloaded:
Suppose you downloaded all notes of a user. If the user posts new notes, only new ones will be downloaded.

4. Categorize the downloaded notes into one folder per user:
to keep your download directory tidy and clean.

5. Restore the date of photo taken/note posted:
In the file explorer, you can sort the images of a user by the date taken/posted.

6. Remove watermarks automatically:
Currently supports images and videos (but not live photos).

âš ï¸ Disclaimer: This tool is provided for educational and personal use only. The developers are not liable for any damages or consequences resulting from your use of this tool.
